info.title: Whisper - WhatsApp API
info.description: Complete API collection for WhatsApp management and messaging with configurable operational modes. Available modes: single (legacy only), multi (multi-instance only), both (hybrid mode).

tags.name: 🌐 Global Endpoints
tags.description: Global endpoints available in all operational modes

tags.name: 🔀 Single Instance (Legacy)
tags.description: Legacy endpoints for single WhatsApp instance operation. Available when WHATSAPP_MODE=single or WHATSAPP_MODE=both

tags.name: 🏢 Multi-Instance Management
tags.description: Modern multi-instance WhatsApp API endpoints with /instances prefix. Available when WHATSAPP_MODE=multi or WHATSAPP_MODE=both

post.summary: Send Media from Instance (Images, Videos, Documents, Audio)
post.description: Send various types of media files through a single unified endpoint. Supports: 📸 Images (JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP), 🎬 Videos (MP4, AVI, MOV), 📄 Documents (PDF, DOC, XLS, PPT, ZIP), 🎵 Audio (MP3, WAV, AAC, OGG). Change the 'type' field to switch between media types. The example shows an image, but you can use the same endpoint for all media formats.
